name: The Aquarium does not dance
description:
This is a horror adventure game where a girl, devoted to her best friend, searches for her companion in an aquarium that has transformed into a terrifying world. As the player escapes from the deformed entities known as "Creepies," they must unravel the mysteries concealed within the aquarium.

While the horror elements are mild, you can savor engaging and substantial puzzle-solving. Apart from the protagonist, a cast of distinctive and charming girls makes their appearance. The narrative unfolds with multiple endings, each shaped by the choices you make.

The gameplay time is approximately 3 hours.

This work was created using RPG Maker MZ.

Control Instructions
Z Button: Confirm, Fast Forward
X Button: Open Menu Screen, Cancel
Arrow Keys: Move Character
Shift Key: Dash

Japanese language only.
